Iphones is an Art

“The iPhone is a really powerful device even if it comes to graphic design or making compositions,” says Robert Jahns. “I like being able to create my art on the go. The iPhone’s a great tool for artists. Its combination of the apps and camera image quality is insane.”

A Work of Wonder - Macbook

"The MacBook is an exquisite piece of Apple engineering on a par with the iPod Classic or original iMac. The other way in which the MacBook stands out is its compact size and low weight. Here it has taken the crown from the MacBook Air, which when it launched in 2008 was so slim and light it was considered revolutionary."
